  • java.lang.Object
    • CompositeDataset
      • vega.uplink.pointing.PointingElement
  • Direct Known Subclasses:

extends CompositeDataset

    • Constructor Detail

      • PointingElement

        public PointingElement()
        This class stores pointing metadata of a pointing block plus any kind of children of a pointing block. It has convenience method to store XML attributes, values and children.

      • PointingElement

        public PointingElement(PointingElement org)
        Read a pointing metadata from another pointing metadata. Basically, it copies all it attributes, children and value. It is convenient for subclasses as originally the whole ptr is read as pointed metadata and then translated into the specific classes.
        Parameters:
        org -

      • PointingElement

        public PointingElement(java.lang.String metaName,
               java.lang.String metaValue)
        Creates a pointing matadata with the given name and value. This is traslated into xml as value
        Parameters:
        metaName -
        metaValue -
